'''0.0.22a_03'''<ref name="_03">[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:31:09 < 08Notch > _03 is up, put the fps meter back in''". (June 29, 2009, 17:31:09 UTC&minus;5; 22:31:09 UTC).</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 29, 2009, at 22:31 UTC.<ref name="_03"/>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* FPS is now once again displayed on the screen.<ref name="_03"/>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Some players were unable to start the game.<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:32:23 <Monte> So um, minecraft isn't loading :(''" [...] "''P5:32:46 <Monte> Notch, I just see a black box with an outline.''" (June 29, 2009, 17:32 UTC&minus;5; 22:32 UTC)</ref>
* Pressing {{key|M}} to toggle sounds may not work.<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:32:32 <tempestdevil> m isn't working for me though D:''" (June 29, 2009, 17:32:32 UTC&minus;5; 22:32:32 UTC)</ref>
